author: greytoc
body:
Fintech isn't new. It's been around pretty much as long as infotech has been around. Firms like Sofi offer cash management services - there is still a traditional bank behind their services. In Sofi's case, the bank is The Bancorp - ticker $tbbk.

And if you look further downstream - most of these kinds of banks use bank cores and payment systems from companies like FIS ($FIS), Fiserv ($FISV), NCR ($NCR), Jack Henry ($JKHY). From what I can see in poking around - The Bancorp may have an FIS backend.
